author: Ella Ceron
title: Rihanna’s $5 Million Donation To Fight COVID-19 Will Center Vulnerable Communities
description: Rihanna's foundation, which she founded in 2012 and named after her grandparents, is joining the fight against the spread of the novel coronavirus and the illness it causes, known as COVID-19.
content:
Rihanna's foundation, which she founded in 2012 and named after her grandparents, is joining the fight against the spread of the novel coronavirus and the illness it causes, known as COVID-19.
